laueimproc

Group some image processing tools to annalyse Laue diagrams.

[main documentation](../html/index.html)

Modules

laueimproc.classes

Defines the data structure used throughout the rest of the module.

laueimproc.common

Little common tools.

laueimproc.convention

Provide tools for switching convention.

laueimproc.diffraction

Implement the Bragg diffraction rules.

laueimproc.gmm

Gaussian mixture model.

laueimproc.immix

Mixture of images.

laueimproc.improc

Tensor processing for Laue.

laueimproc.io

Read an write the data on the harddisk, persistant layer.

laueimproc.ml

General machine learning utils.

laueimproc.nn

Neuronal Network sub module.

laueimproc.opti

Provide various tools for improving the efficiency of laueimproc.

laueimproc.testing

Management of all unit tests.
